lines.text:
[in the form of a raven]
When you first used Solomon's locket, you opened a doorway to another universe... Cartagra...
Cartagra?
...the place where the true battle between good and evil is played out for eternity.
I still don't...

Sarah and you have actually stumbled into God's Nintendo game, where He and the devil fight it out, using their various Time Warriors as different characters... forever trying to tip that delicate balance one way or another.

[Releasing prisoners from Scarabis's Dungeon]
Do you guys know how to fight?
[Prisoners cheer]
Then let's go kick some butt!
[Prisoners look puzzled]

[Wrestling Sarah to the ground]
A kiss at the point of death is more pleasurable than the most intense orgasm imaginable...
Before I kill you, tell me; from what village does such reckless impetuosity originate?
America!
Of course!
America? Is that North or South of London?
It's the future!
Kind of West...
Well, let us pray no more of your friends venture East!
You ain't heard nothing yet!

[Sarah has reacted negatively to Scarabis's Master Plan]
Does this mean you don't love me anymore?
You bet it does, brother of mine.
Well, that does shed a bit of a different light on things. George. Kill the bitch.
Totally.
[seeing Mark and Scarabus slash and kill several shopping mall zombies]
Who the hell are they?
Whoever they are... they're bad!
[last lines]
Sarah, now that you're free, what are you going to do now?

[holds up the timepiece device and smiles]
I'm going back.
[Mark (as Douglas) must read a body the burial prayer, quickly]
Read directly to the bones... page 210, chapter 13, verse 7.
Ecapsmi evig nig inglock...
Douglas, the book is upside down.
You don't suppose they...?
It's a distinct possibility.
I want her checked!
You slut! And vith Henry Clavell, my best friend!
Vell perhaps if you spent less time vith that heap of brain-damaged flesh in the basement and more time vith me, I vouldn't have to seek pleasures elsevere! Vould I?
But vith him!
Now, just a minute!

[Realises he has poured vinegar, not water, over the hole the vulture has gored in Roger's chest]
Ooh! Sorry!
Don't worry, it's only a flesh wound...

[Hosting a wild party]
I'm BORED! So bloody bored...
